entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 24 January 2023
